name: Shimano Deore CS-M771 XT 10 Speed Cassette
description: Lightweight and durable, this 10-speed Shimano XT cassette will give you the gearing to tackle the steeps, up and down.HyperGlide™ cogs are ramped and machined for smooth shifting.2 aluminum spiders keep the weight low.Compatible with HG-X 10-speed chains.Compatible with 2x10 and 1x10 drivetrains.11-13-15-17-19-21-23-26-30-34T (bJ) or 11-13-15-17-19-21-24-28-32-36T (bk).
